zhcn_desc: §E§H影响力§!（£influence£）代表了政治影响力，可用于许多方面，如制造§H宣称§!以及建造§H哨站§!等。其生成速度在游戏流程中基本是固定的，不过可以通过宣布其他帝国为你的§H宿敌§!或是提升§H力量投射§!能力来提升。\n\n§H力量投射§!最多能给予§Y2§!§H影响力§!加成，具体数值取决于相较§H帝国规模§!你拥有多少舰船。§!
en_desc: §E§HInfluence§! (£influence£) represents political clout, and is used for many things, like making §HClaims§! and building §HOutposts§!. The gain rate remains fairly constant throughout the game, but can be increased by declaring other empires your §HRivals§! or increasing your §HPower Projection§!.\n\n§HPower Projection§! grants up to §Y2§! §HInfluence§! depending on how many Ships you have compared to your §HEmpire Size§!.§!
